A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Mixed feelings about this one. Some of the coolest visuals in Star Wars\, the Praetorian guard fight was great\, visions between Rey and Kylo Ren was cool\, Yoda's appearance was awesome! However\, the constant joking made it feel like a marvel movie\, not Star Wars\, no character said \"I've got a bad feeling about this\" Luke was written as a quitter and the exact opposite of what fans wanted\, not to mention the bad Leia \"Mary Poppins\" scene. Hopefully episode 9 will right these flaws and give a spectacular end to the Skywalker saga.
